item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Authentication_Request_Native_External
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Authentication_Request_Native_External Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Container_Authentication_Request_Native_External data type contains information for requests to the getPortalLogin API. This class serves as a base class for more specialized external authentication classes to the SoftLayer Native login (username/password). Local password Your SoftLayer customer portal user's portal password. Type: string securityQuestionAnswer The answer to your security question. Type: string securityQuestionId A security question you wish to answer when authenticating to the SoftLayer customer portal.
